TitleEnglish: The 100th Timeʼs the Charm: She Was Executed 99 Times, So How Did She Unlock 'Super Love' Mode?! – Her 100th Life Begins as She Awakens to Her True Power
TitleJapanese: 99回断罪されたループ令嬢ですが今世は『超絶愛されモード』ですって!? ～真の力に目覚めて始まる100回目の人生～
Aliases: 99-kai Danzaisareta Loop Reijō Desu ga Konse wa "Chōzetsu Aisare Mode" Desutte!?: Shinno Chikara ni Mezamete Hajimaru 100-kaime no Jinsei
